module: Module-level comment: The Altera_UP_Audio_In_Deserializer module deserializes incoming stereo audio data. It utilizes a shift register to facilitate the deserialization process, as per clock edge signals. With two sync FIFO buffers for left and right channel data management, and control signals to prevent overflow or empty read attempts, this module ensures seamless audio data conversion for use in a computational system while maintaining proper synchronization.
